sentences.en: All Christians believe the orthodox doctrine of the Trinity.
sentences.cn: 所有的基督徒都相信正统的三一神教义.

sentences.en: Are you saying I have to choose whether Trinity lives or dies?
sentences.cn: 你的意思是说我得自己选择崔妮蒂的命运?

sentences.en: Christian doctrine that stresses individual freedom of belief and rejects the Trinity.
sentences.cn: 强调个人自由,反对三位一体论的基督教教派.

sentences.en: Could you tell me how to get to Trinity Hotel please?
sentences.cn: 请问到三一旅馆(trinityHotel)怎么走?

sentences.en: God is one and three; thus the Trinity solves the one - and - many problem.
sentences.cn: 上帝是一位,也是三个位格.三位一体解决了一而众的问题.

sentences.en: He was elected a fellow of Trinity College in Cambridge and assistant tutor.
sentences.cn: 他当选为剑桥的三一学院的研究员和助理导师.

sentences.en: I don't understand a modern day account of the Holy Trinity.
sentences.cn: 我对现代的基督教三位一体的解释不理解.

sentences.en: Students of Holy Trinity College presented their model and design.
sentences.cn: 宝血会上智英文书院的同学介绍她们的设计模型.

sentences.en: Study of the Trinity reveals that otherness is absolute.
sentences.cn: 三位一体的研究显露出,他性是绝对性的.

sentences.en: The largest college, Trinity, was founded by King Henry III in 1546.
sentences.cn: 最大的三一学院则是由国王亨利三世在1546年建立的.

sentences.en: The third person of the Trinity, the Holy Spirit, was the subject of later debates.
sentences.cn: 三位一体中的第三个 —— 圣灵, 是后来争论的主题.

sentences.en: The truth of the Trinity is a New Testament revelation.
sentences.cn: 三位一体的真理,是新约时期的启示.

sentences.en: Trinity : Is that what they say?
Trinity College is an Equal Opportunities Employer.
sentences.cn: 三一学院是个给予均等机会的雇主.

sentences.en: Trinity had never been unkind to me.
sentences.cn: 三一学院从未亏待过我.

words.tran_cn: 三倍的；三分一对座的；三重的；顺利的
三位一体；三人一组；三个一组的东西；三倍

phrases.tran_cn: 三位一体（基督教圣父，圣子，圣灵三位一体）
三一学院（剑桥大学一学院）；三一大学（美国一大学）

trans.tran_cn: <正>三人小组，三件一套，三合一
trans.tran_en: in the Christian religion, the union of Father, Son, and Holy Spirit in one God
